# Identifying phenotype-associated subpopulations through LP_SGL 

Forked from [https://github.com/hongmeizhanghm/LP_GSL](https://github.com/hongmeizhanghm/LP_SGL), made it a package.

Please use [SigBridgeR](https://github.com/WangLabCSU/SigBridgeR) for the fork version of LP_SGL. Bug reports and feature requests are welcomed at [SigBridgeR-issues](https://github.com/WangLabCSU/SigBridgeR/issues).


## Installation

```{r,eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("Exceret/LP_SGL")
```
